title: #EDxMiniA476
description:
At TEDxAuckland 2017 attendees were approached by players from The Problem. Once selected, they were taken to a hidden room and given the opportunity to talk about a significant global or national problem they would like to solve.
 
If this is your favourite talk, vote by tagging @Auckland_Libs on Twitter using the hashtag #EDxMiniA476 or like this video here or on Twitter.
 
The speaker with the most likes by  12noon on Monday 11 December 2017, will get the chance to pitch their idea to speak at the next TEDxAuckland.
 
The Problem is a real world game brought to you through a partnership with Auckland Libraries and The Problem, download the app now – visit: www.theproblem.org.nz
 
Watch all top 5 videos here and vote for your favourite! 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLcm2pIIAwlDv8TaGu92limqVEmJN6q7eb
